name: t2m_7
si: povprečna temperatura zraka na 2 m ob 7 h (°C)
en: average air temperature at 2 m at 7 a.m. (°C)

name: t2m_14
si: povprečna temperatura zraka na 2 m ob 14 h (°C)
en: average air temperature at 2 m at 2 p.m. (°C)

name: t2m_21
si: povprečna temperatura zraka na 2 m ob 21 h (°C)
en: average air temperature at 2 m at 9 p.m. (°C)

name: tmax_abs_dan
si: datum z absolutno maksimalno temperaturo na 2 m
en: date with absolute maximum temperature at 2 m

name: tmin_abs_dan
si: datum z absolutno minimalno temperaturo na 2 m
en: the date with the absolute minimum temperature at 2 m

name: tmin_5cm_abs_dan
si: datum z absolutno minimalno temperaturo na 5cm
en: date with absolute minimum temperature at 5cm

name: rh_min_dan
si: datum z absolutno minimalno relativno vlago
en: date with absolute minimum relative humidity

name: oblacnost_7
si: povprečna oblačnost ob 7 h (pokritost neba v %)
en: average cloud cover at 7 a.m. (sky coverage in %)

name: oblacnost_14
si: povprečna oblačnost ob 14 h (pokritost neba v %)
en: average cloud cover at 2 p.m. (sky coverage in %)

name: oblacnost_21
si: povprečna oblačnost ob 21 h (pokritost neba v %)
en: average cloud cover at 9 p.m. (sky coverage in %)

name: padavine_max_dan
si: datum z maksimalno dnevno količino padavin
en: the date with the maximum daily rainfall

name: visinaodeje_max_dan
si: datum z maksimalno višino snežne odeje
en: the date with the maximum height of the snow cover

name: stdni_mocanvet
si: število dni z močnim vetrom (> 6 bf)
en: number of days with strong wind (> 6 bf)

name: stdni_viharnivet
si: število dni z viharnim vetrom (> 8 bf)
en: number of days with gale force winds (> 8 bf)

name: stdni_pad_nad01
si: število dni s padavinami nad 0.1 mm
en: number of days with precipitation above 0.1 mm

name: stdni_pad_nad1
si: število dni s padavinami nad 1 mm
en: number of days with precipitation above 1 mm

name: stdni_pad_nad10
si: število dni s padavinami nad 10 mm
en: number of days with precipitation above 10 mm

name: stdni_pad_nad20
si: število dni s padavinami nad 20 mm
en: number of days with precipitation above 20 mm

name: stdni_dez_nad01
si: število dni z dežjem nad 0.1 mm
en: number of days with rain above 0.1 mm

name: stdni_dez_s_snegom
s: št. dni z dežjem in snegom >0.1 mm
si: število dni z dežjem in snegom nad 0.1 mm
en: number of days with rain and snow above 0.1 mm

name: stdni_sneg_nad01
si: število dni s snegom nad 0.1 mm
en: number of days with snow above 0.1 mm

name: stdni_sneznaod_7
en: number of days with snow cover

name: stdni_rhpod30
si: število dni z relativno vlago pod 30%
en: number of days with relative humidity below 30%

name: stdni_rhpod50
si: število dni z relativno vlago pod 50%
en: number of days with relative humidity below 50%

name: stdni_rhnad80
si: število dni z relativno vlago nad 80%
en: number of days with relative humidity above 80%
